RecordOperationSpec.Name: CCH Verified
RecordOperationSpec.Description: This updates the status of a CCH to verified
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPOperationImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_CHILDEXTENSION_CCHVERIFIED_UPDATE ( @id uniqueidentifier, @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier ) as begin declare @includeIneligibleInUpdate_False bit = 0 -- Do not include Ineligible children in eligible/pending updates. declare @pendingReasonString_NewChildVerification nvarchar(100) = 'New Child Verification'
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
update dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION set CCHVALIDATED = 1, DATECHANGED = getdate(), CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = @ID
exec dbo.USR_USP_CHILD_REMOVEPENDINGREASON @id, null, @pendingReasonString_NewChildVerification, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_CHILD_CHECKELIGIBILITY @id, @changeAgentID exec dbo.USR_USP_CHILD_SETELIGIBLEORPENDING @id, includeIneligibleInUpdate_False, @changeAgentID
return 0;
end

StandardPrompt.Text: Click Yes to verify the CCH form.
